Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a wide array of features designed to enhance your daily life but also carries a rich history and craftsmanship that makes it truly unique. Given its quality and exclusivity, I believe this opportunity is well worth considering. I kindly invite you to accept my offer of $150 for the product, which I am confident will provide you with immense value. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
